downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 Security Hardening Guide
downloadDescription: This document provides guidelines and instructions to help you deploy Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 more securely.
detailsSection:
This guide provides information about how to improve security when deploying Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.

The following information is included:
  • Helping to secure the Microsoft Dynamics AX client in a production environment using Windows and Windows Server features, such as Terminal Services and RemoteApp
  • Helping to secure the Microsoft Dynamics AX Application Object Server (AOS) and database
  • Security best practices
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
